title: Looking for people who wants to screw around in LOL
body:
I'm currently looking for people who wants to enjoy LOL to it's fullest.
Our type of play is to go full crazy with whoever we want (i.e. all jungle and see who can kill the enemy jungle the most before the game ends, stupid builds (full Doran's Blade build) or whatever the hell we feel like).
I don't care if we lose or win, so post your IGN if you want to join me!

replies.body:
I've been waiting for you.

Was playing with a chap this morning who came up with ARAM bullrush. (first to execute on nexus turrets wins) Topkeks.

But yes I am definately keen for some antics
IGN: TouchMyKimchi
My IGN is MysticNinja, PM me.

Im happy to have some fun, as long as its not ranked lol
IGN: TreeJay
Nice. I'd like to play with you some time.

Now we just need a set time for everyone to get on and game, I have one more friend who's willing to join us.
Reply whichever time fits for you guys
